Articles.Content:
I'd love to see a simple wheel added to the parts list in a few different sizes (or if possible, procedural): No gear, no extra bits, just a wheel and an attachment point.  This would allow for creating classic aircraft, and who knows what other cool things. Down the line, if there are ever parts similar to Breaking Ground, it would allow for creating custom steering and really open up vehicle building as well.

 

I'm thinking something like on this SPAD.

 

g
a simple disk on an axle that can be motorised and locked would help with custom vehicles yes
